document.docAuthor: Bolger, Thomas, Arroyo, Julio & Piotrowska, Katarzyna
document.masterDocTitle: A catalogue of the species of Mesostigmata (Arachnida, Acari, Parasitiformes) recorded from Ireland including information on their geographical distribution and habitats

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A catalogue of the species of Mesostigmata (Arachnida, Acari, Parasitiformes) recorded from Ireland including information on their geographical distribution and habitats

subSubSection.paragraph: Irish Records : Pasture on peat ( Whelan, 1976 ).

•
Amblyseius caudatus Berlese, 1914
• Original name :
Amblyseius caudatus Berlese, 1914
• In :
Redia
, 10: 145. • Combinations/variations used in Irish literature:
Typhlodromus caudatus (Berlese) ( Emmanuel, 1977 )
.
Irish Records : Hedgerow around barley field ( Emmanuel, 1977 ).
• In : Deutschlands Crustaceen , Myriopoden und Arachniden . 1835–1844 . Regensburg, fasc. 27 (13).

Irish Records : Pasture ( Curry, 1976a ; Bolger, 1980); hedgerow around barley field ( Emmanuel, 1977 ); pasture and gorse bank at seashore ( Purvis, 1982 ); fungal sporocarp ( O’Connell, 1994 ); canopy and moss on Sitka spruce (
Arroyo et al ., 2010
), nest of
Lasius flavus
and pasture (
Arroyo et al ., 2015
).
Counties: Dublin, Kildare, Laois, Limerick, Wexford .
• In : Acarologie , Schriftenreihe für Vergleichende Milbenkunde , 5: 24.

• Combinations/variations used in Irish literature:
Amblyseius finlandicus (Oudemans)
( Curry, 1976a ; Momen, 1986 , 1987 ). Irish Records : Pasture ( Curry, 1976a ); leaves, twigs, buds and bark of unsprayed apple trees ( Momen, 1986 , 1987 ). Counties: Dublin .

• Combinations/variations used in Irish literature:
Seiulus tiliarum Oudemans
( Momen, 1986 , 1987 ).
Irish Records : Leaves, buds, bark and twings of unsprayed apple trees ( Momen, 1986 , 1987 ).

Neoseiulus Hughes, 1948
•
Neoseiulus alpinus (Schweizer, 1922)
• Original name :
Amblyseius obtustus var. alpinus Schweizer, 1922
. • In : Veerhandlungen der Natur ferschenden Gessellschaft in Basel , 33: 41. • Combinations/variations used in Irish literature:
Amblyseius aurescens Athias
( Breslin, 1979 ; Bolger, 1980; Purvis, 1982 ).
Irish Records : Soil of sugar beet crop ( Breslin, 1979 ); pasture (Bolger, 1980); dune at seashore ( Purvis,

bibRefCitation.author: Hughes, A. M.
bibRefCitation.refString: Hughes, A. M. (1948) The mites associated with stored food products. H. M. S. O., London, 168 pp.

subSubSection.paragraph: • In : The mites associated with stored food products . Ministry of Agriculture and Fisheries, H.M. Stationery Office, London, 141.
• In : The Canadian Entomologist , 88, 26. Irish Records : Pasture on peat ( Whelan, 1976 ). Counties: Kildare .

• In :
Proceedings of the Entomological Society of Washington
, 11: 135.

• Combinations/variations used in Irish literature:
Typhlodromus soleiger (Ribiga) ( Emmanuel, 1977 )
.

Irish Records : Hedgerow around barley field ( Emmanuel, 1977 ); bedding of
Oryctolagus cuniculus
(unpublished data).

•
Proprioseiopsis okanagensis (Chant, 1957)
• Original name :
Typhlodromus okanagensis Chant, 1957
. • In : The Canadian Entomologist , 89: 293. • Combinations/variations used in Irish literature:
Amblyseius okanagensis (Chant)
( Curry, 1976a ; Tuohy,
Irish Records : Pasture ( Curry, 1976a , b ); hedgerow around barley field ( Emmanuel, 1977 ).
